Description: 2018 Gibson SG Standard: This guitar is super clean as it should be as it is just over one year old. Super light at 6lbs., 4oz. Last year of the small, early '60's style pick guard. New, easy adjust Nashville bridge. Grover locking tuners. 60's slim tapered neck profile. 61R and 61T humbuclers. This guitar has just been set up with 10 gauge strings and is ready to play. No fret wear and just some typical light surface scratched. One weird circular impression tin the clear coat on the body in the armrest area that is very hard to see. Includes original hard shell case as shown, paperwork, tools and case goodies. Guitars can experience slight changes in shipping that may require minor adjustments. In addition, I can not predict how you like your guitar set up.
